name: Tower with spire
description:
The goal of the game is to build the highest possible tower.

The tower is being built in three stages. By clicking with the left mouse button,

bricks at each stage. Right click set

A heavy brick that completes the stage. When to put heavy

brick player decides for himself. At the last stage, the spire is installed

which must last five seconds. Don't let the tower fall

at any of the stages or the exit of bricks from the construction zone.
